content.text:
# Queenseis Kariya

Shingo Sakai
| captain     =  Hinata Shigihara
| league      = SV.League
| season      = 2024-2025
| position    = 9th Place
| website     = http://queenseis-tab.com/
}}
, formerly the  is a women's volleyball team based in Kariya city, Aichi, Japan. It plays in SV.League. The club was founded in 1951.
The owner of the team is Toyota Auto Body.
Queenseis is a coined word combining Queen and Seis ("six" in Spanish).
History
*It was founded in 1951.
*It promoted to V.Challenge League in 1999.
*It promoted to V.Premier League in 2006.
Honours
*V.Challenge League
**Champion(1) - 2005-06
**Runner-up(1) - 2004-05
*'''Empress's Cup
**Champion (1): 2008
**Runner-up (2): 2011, 2018
**Champion (1): 2017
*Kurowashiki All Japan Volleyball Tournament
**Champion (1): 2014
